name: Solus Island
description:
You awake in a bed in an unfamiliar place.

A simple RPG maker game. You must study the resources around you to figure out why you're here, and who you are. 

Something big may be happening here; something that affects millions more then you.

Credits

Me - for everything not mentioned
Michael Terkanian - For music (Playlist here)
Font by Blambot Comic Fonts
Sound effects from Kenney Game Assets 1
